metadata.name: Frostine's Journey_001
metadata.description:
--Heart is the powersource of us dragon.
And the young ones are all on a journey to perfect their heartsü§ç

In the land of fiery Mountains and blazing sky
crystal blue hair is something rare among our people.
you know.. dragon...

our souls burn with fire. 
but mine brings winter.

I don't want to freeze them.. 
I just.. hope my heart could bring some warm to all of my friends

Mmm how do i start? Of all the imperfect substances in this world.
What could be the right ingredient?

Mmm too thin, too big, not enough

I must be particular with the ingredients to construct my heart

--After flipping through many pages..

This must be it! 
This sweet smell and a little touch of sunshine. Trust ? eh? from a master?

Mmm too little, which master?
just anyone?
I will become a maid and find the right one!üíô‚ùÑÔ∏è

My heart will be perfect! like a crystal, like a shiny knife,

Like winter.

Hi~ I'm frostine. a maid in training‚ùÑÔ∏è
